definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
tenth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/tenth in order/letter "J" or Roman "X" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 15°/deca

sentences.english: Coyett was now truly on his own, against impossible odds.
sentences.chinese: 揆一這一次真的只有靠自己，毫無勝算。

sentences.english: But Coyett's own countrymen were not as merciful as his adversary.
sentences.chinese: 但是揆一的同胞卻不像他的對手那樣仁慈。

definition: to give in to/to be swayed by (personal considerations etc)/Taiwan pr. [xun2]/to follow/to expose publicly/variant of 侚[xun4]/variant of 殉[xun4]
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
the whole course of an event from beginning to end/ins and outs/the fundamental and the incidental
numerous/common people (or populace)/born of a concubine
